text:
Take-aways of #ShotCallers #COVIDVaccination: 
-need better👩‍🔬 #science edu to tackle hesitancy
-transparency is🗝️
-access & shortages = main concern
-49 mil have received #COVID19💉= safe

last words from Prof. Guido Rasi: 'Its a🌍effort. Behave safely until you get the #vaccine' https://t.co/TiNT4VzpRh
